patch.summary: Endpoint to add and remove drivers from a group of drivers. (endpoint for back office)

requestBody.description:
Add drivers: The listOfDrivers array is made up of all the drivers that are already there, plus those that you want to add. Those that want to add the new attribute are true and the rest are false. 

 Remove drivers: just send the listOfDrivers array with the users we want to keep. 

 It is possible to add and remove in the same order simply by adding new to true

patch.summary: Endpoint to update hear beat (internal endpoint)
Endpoint to change Availability

requestBody.description:
Availability can be \'Always\' or \'Custom\', 

 If it's \'Custom\' for each day it is necessary to indicate whether it is selected \'isSelected\', indicate availabilityDay \'allDay or costum\'

 If availabilityDay equal to \'allDay\' it is not necessary to indicate the range

 If availabilityDay equal to \'costum\' it is necessary to indicate the range

patch.summary: Endpoint to change acess Type

requestBody.description:
AccessType: Access Type cam be \'Public\', \'Private\', \'Restrict\';

 If the accessType = \'Restrict\', it will be necessary to send a list of groups (\'listOfGroups\')

 If the accessType = \'Public\', you can send list of groups (\'listOfGroups\') 

 The groupId attribute is the id of the group of charger station users that will have access to the charger

mapVisibility.example: If accessType Public need to send mapVisibility true or false

patch.summary: Endpoint Update a tariff in a plug

requestBody.description:
The tariff array is to be sent everything that exists. That is, if you have 5 different tariffs and if you only want to change one, the 5 will be sent the same. This way it is possible to edit more than one tariff at the same time. 

 The groupName attribute corresponds to the group name and the groupId corresponds to the group id that will have that tariff. If the charger is public, the groupName will be \'Public\' and the groupId will be empty \'\'

 The tariffId attribute corresponds to the tariff id. If not assigned it goes empty

post.summary: Endpoint to make communication with the charger stations/HMD

requestBody.description:
When the stop is given through the owner of the charger, in the situation of the stop when there is reason, (assest of the rating),

It is also necessary to send the completed _id and stopReason attributes, in the remaining existing cases it is not necessary to send the attributes

_id -> is the _id of the session you want to end

 resonCode -> is the code for the reason you want to end

restonText -> is the text written by the user when the resonCode is \'other\'

requestBody.description:
The configuration attribute will send information about what you want to configure (perido, wifi, mqtt). 

 if period: you have to send the period attribute filled in seconds 

 if wifi: the wifi object must be sent, filled in with the network name and password 

 if mqtt: the mqtt object filled with the ip, port, user and password must be sent

apikey.description: API key to authorize requests. If you don't have an EVIO API key, use `eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJjbGllbnRUeXBlIjoiUG9zdG1hbiIsImNsaWVudE5hbWUiOiJFVklPIiwiaWF0IjoxNTgwMTIxNDMxLCJleHAiOjE2MTYxMjE0MzF9.gLlgFSAB765oWiW_n8R84etVt5N_OFVrjqGh3OJL4V8`.
apikey.name: apikey

token.description:
Token received after login. Required to be able to use the rest of the features. 
 Example: `eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJfaWQiOiI1ZGNkNzg2MmI0OGIwZDAwMmMzN2U0ZTkiLCJ1c2VybmFtZSI6IjkzODc1NDg2OSIsImxhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW4iLCJpYXQiOjE2MDgwNDg5NzksImV4cCI6MTY0NDA0ODk3OX0.tPRoew4cdoyT_ZfVJ2up2h_5lMh2BaaeSMPkgqx-Hiw`
token.name: token

refreshtoken.description:
Refresh token received after login. Required to be able to use the rest of the features. 
 Example: `eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJfaWQiOiI1ZGNkNzg2MmI0OGIwZDAwMmMzN2U0ZTkiLCJ1c2VybmFtZSI6IjkzODc1NDg2OSIsImxhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW4iLCJpYXQiOjE2MDgwNDg5NzksImV4cCI6MTY0NDA0ODk3OX0.tPRoew4cdoyT_ZfVJ2up2h_5lMh2BaaeSMPkgqx-Hiw`
refreshtoken.name: refreshtoken

maxTime.Example: In maxtime the maximum time is 1000 minutes

Group.description: Data model shared by user groups, infrastructures and fleets. Not all attributes are used by all different groups.

groupType.description:
10 for user group, 
 20 for infrastructure, 
 30 for fleet

children.description: Attribute used in fleets and user groups

_id.description: Bookings ID or booking id you want to receive

hwId.description: List of hwId od the chargers

reason.description: Object received when payment for wallet declined

data.description: Object received when a request is made to adyen to make payment

dataReceived.description: Object received in the Adyen notification when it approves or declines payment

Request History Logs.description: Logs of all orders placed in the payments microservice

provider.examples: If credit providers are MBWay, MBRef/PSNet, MBRef, PSNet or Card if debit providers are wallet or Card

data.description: Object received when a request is made

dataReceived.description: Object received in notification when it approves or declines

mapIcon.description: Key(Name of the icon) - Value(Link to Icon), SVG

cards.description: Key(Name of the icon) - Value(Link to Icon), SVG
